LanguageData.OE_Infestor_Acid.label: acid infestor
LanguageData.OE_Infestor_Acid.description: Obsidia infestor is a genetically-engineered medium-sized insectoid. Designed for long-range combat. It is, however, very slow and weak in close combat.\n\nThis specimen secrete Acid bile for spitting.
LanguageData.OE_Infestor_Acid.tools.head_claw.label: head claw
LanguageData.OE_Infestor_Acid.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.OE_Infestor_Acid.verbs.acid_spit.label: acid spit
LanguageData.Bullet_Infestor_Acid.label: acid infestor spit
LanguageData.OE_Infestor_Fire.label: fire infestor
LanguageData.OE_Infestor_Fire.description: Obsidia infestor is a genetically-engineered medium-sized insectoid. Designed for long-range combat. It is, however, very slow and weak in close combat.\n\nThis specimen secrete Fire bile for spitting.
LanguageData.OE_Infestor_Fire.tools.head_claw.label: head claw
LanguageData.OE_Infestor_Fire.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.OE_Infestor_Fire.verbs.fire_spit.label: fire spit
LanguageData.Bullet_Infestor_Fire.label: fire infestor spit
LanguageData.OE_Infestor_Tox.label: tox infestor
LanguageData.OE_Infestor_Tox.description: Obsidia infestor is a genetically-engineered medium-sized insectoid. Designed for long-range combat. It is, however, very slow and weak in close combat.\n\nThis specimen secrete Toxic bile for spitting.
LanguageData.OE_Infestor_Tox.tools.head_claw.label: head claw
LanguageData.OE_Infestor_Tox.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.OE_Infestor_Tox.verbs.tox_spit.label: tox spit
LanguageData.Bullet_Infestor_Tox.label: tox infestor spit
LanguageData.OE_Mutalisk_Corrupter.label: corrupter mutalisk
LanguageData.OE_Mutalisk_Corrupter.description: Obsidia mutalisk is a genetically-engineered giant insectoid. This is not a combat unit. Designed as a support unit that emits an aura that weakens opponents.\n\nThe aura increases movement speed but reduces armor.
LanguageData.OE_Mutalisk_Corrupter.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.OE_Mutalisk_Psy.label: psy-mutalisk
LanguageData.OE_Mutalisk_Psy.description: Obsidia mutalisk is a genetically-engineered giant insectoid. This is not a combat unit. Designed as a support unit that emits an aura that weakens opponents.\n\nThe aura increases psy-sensitivity but reduces the rest of the psy potential.
LanguageData.OE_Mutalisk_Psy.tools.head_claw.label: head claw
LanguageData.OE_Mutalisk_Psy.tools.head.label: head
